GSD.description:
drm/radeon: fix a possible null pointer dereference

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.247 by commit 8a89bfeef9abe93371e3ea8796377f2d132eee29. For more details please see the references link.
